scripts.build: npm run --silent languages:refresh && npm run --silent build:typescript
scripts.languages:refresh: ( cd ./src/data/_locales/ && jq --slurp --sort-keys 'map({ (.extensionLocale.message): { direction: .extensionLocaleBidiDirection.message, sample: .frontend_voicesSampleText.message } }) | add' $(find . -name 'messages.json') > "../languages/extracted.json~" ; ) && mv "./src/data/languages/extracted.json~" "./src/data/languages/extracted.json" && jq --slurp --sort-keys '{ base: .[0], languages: .[1] } + .[3]' "./src/data/languages/base.json" "./src/data/languages/extracted.json" "./src/data/languages/overrides.json" > "./src/data/languages/languages.json~" && mv "./src/data/languages/languages.json~" "./src/data/languages/languages.json"
scripts.messages:count: ( cd ./src/data/_locales/ && for MESSAGES in $(find . -name 'messages.json'); do jq 'to_entries | .[].key' "$MESSAGES"; done | sort | uniq -c | sort -n -r ; )
scripts.messages:download: npm run --silent messages:sort && webext-translator './src/data' en base.json automatic.json && npm run --silent messages:sort
scripts.messages:override:refresh: ( cd ./src/data/_locales/ && for MESSAGES in $(find . \( -name 'override.json' -or -name 'manual.json' \)); do jq --slurp --sort-keys '.[0] as $en | .[1] | with_entries(.key as $key | .value |= (.original = $en[$key].message) + if $en[$key].description then { description: $en[$key].description } else {} end + if $en[$key].placeholders then { placeholders: $en[$key].placeholders } else {} end)' "./en/messages.json" "$MESSAGES" > "${MESSAGES}~"; mv "${MESSAGES}~" "$MESSAGES"; done ; )
scripts.messages:prune: find ./src/data/_locales -type f -iname 'override.json' -or -iname 'automatic.json' | while read P; do jq --argjson messageNames "$(jq --compact-output 'to_entries | map(.key)' ./src/data/_locales/en/base.json)" 'with_entries(select(.key as $key | $messageNames | indices($key) | length == 1))' "$P" > "${P}~" && mv "${P}~" "$P"; done
scripts.messages:refresh: npm run --silent messages:sort && ./src/translation-merge.sh && npm run --silent messages:sort && npm run --silent messages:override:refresh
scripts.messages:sort: ( cd ./src/data/_locales/ && for MESSAGES in $(find . -name '*.json'); do jq --sort-keys '.' "$MESSAGES" > "${MESSAGES}~"; mv "${MESSAGES}~" "$MESSAGES"; done ; )
scripts.messages:translate: npm run --silent messages:download && npm run --silent messages:refresh && npm run --silent messages:count
scripts.rebuild: npm run --silent clean && npm run --silent rebuild:messages && npm run --silent build
scripts.rebuild:messages: npm run --silent messages:refresh && npm run --silent messages:prune
